string-array.name: view_defser_queries
string-array.item: select distinct s.tvdb_id from series s join episode e on (e.series = s.tvdb_id) where datetime(e.firstAired/1000, \'unixepoch\') >= datetime(\'now\') order by e.firstAired

select distinct s.tvdb_id from series s join episode e on (e.series = s.tvdb_id) where datetime(e.firstAired/1000, \'unixepoch\') >= datetime(\'now\') and e.season = 1 and e.episode = 1 order by e.firstAired
select tvdb_id from series where watchlist = 1 order by name
select distinct s.tvdb_id from series s join episode e on (e.series = s.tvdb_id) where e.collected = 1 and e.watched = 0 order by e.firstAired
select distinct s.tvdb_id from series s join episode e on (e.series = s.tvdb_id) where e.collected = 1 order by s.name
select distinct s.tvdb_id from series s join episode e on (e.series = s.tvdb_id) where e.watched = 1 order by s.name
